```py
import jax
jax.config.update("jax_debug_nans", True)

def f(x, y):
  return x / y
jax.jit(f)(0., 0.)  # ==> raises FloatingPointError exception! 
```

```py
import jax
jax.config.update("jax_disable_jit", True)

def f(x):
  y = jnp.log(x)
  if jnp.isnan(y):
    breakpoint()
  return y
jax.jit(f)(-2.)  # ==> Enters PDB breakpoint! 
```
